biography.content:
B.A. in psychology, University of Alberta, Canada; M.A. and Ph.D. human factors University of Wyoming, United States.
Faculty member: Air Force Institute of Technology,  F.E. Warren Air Force Base, Cheynne, Wyoming, United States
Faculty member:  assistant professor University of Texas Division of Continuing Education; Evaluator, National Cancer Institute Educational grant for healthcare professionals (6 years); associate professor, graduate school of business Rice University, Houston, Houston Baptist University, University of Houston (taught in M.B.A. programs) - 9 years; Founder, CRG Medical Foundation for Patient Safety (dba Community Medical Foundation for Patient Safety, 2003) - current).
